text: Niścaẏa yisakalē kupharaī karaichē ārau mānuhaka āllāhara pathara paraā nibr̥tta karaichē lagatē siham̐tara ōcarata hidāẏata suspaṣṭa hōraāra pichatō raāchulara biraōdhitā karaichē, siham̐tē kētiẏā'ō āllāhara kōnō kṣati karaiba nōraāraiba. Atiśīghraē tē'ōm̐ siham̐tara āmalasamūha niṣphala karai diba
